item.source: Moparscape needs an android or Iphone app :s

item.title: Moparscape needs an android or Iphone app :s
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

My only problem with the mobile theme is that, being a mod and having a job, I often don’t have a connection to a desktop. Therefore, during the busy hours of the day (when most people are online, and I’m at work) I’m not able to perform my duties. I can try to get to the desktop theme, but it’s really a hassle (sometimes I have to force the theme through the URL, sometimes I have to logout, change to desktop theme, and login).

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape needs an android or Iphone app :s

item.title: Moparscape needs an android or Iphone app :s
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I’m fine with mobile theme, I use it 80% of the time. It’s relatively efficient besides it’s inability to properly check your older PMs.

item.title: Moparscape needs an android or Iphone app :s
item.dc:creator: @thakillah thakillah
item.description:
@thakillah wrote:

vortex:

http://www.tapatalk.com/

if you want the tapatalk forum app free goto www.apkmania.com search for tapatalk forums (androidonly) download the latest version and install it
if the name of the download is (example) tapatalk.txt change te txt to apk. and click on the file hit install enjoy work with many other apps without jailbrake

Making a tut for iphone too with no jailbrake
